Season‚Äôs Greetings from all of us at ùêÑùêÖùêÇùêÄ!üéÑ
 
The entire team of the European Fisheries Control Agency wishes you a holiday season full of happiness, joy and peace. https://t.co/xfCQl7kKXW

The LOB (Liaison On Board) aboard the #LundySentinel keeps a lookout during the vessel's recently completed mission in the #NorthSea, with Swedishüá∏üá™ and Danishüá©üá∞ inspectors and an observer from Norwayüá≥üá¥ on board. https://t.co/bIzCu49ck5

The President of the Port Authority, Jes√∫s V√°zquez Almui√±a, and his team, met with our Director @susan_steele_ at the 140-year old fishing port, one of the biggest in the world. https://t.co/pUgBL1CjIF

A source of nutrition.
A source of employment.
A way of life.
 
The sea gives us all of this and more. And working for #SustainableFisheries is at the core of what we do.
 
Here‚Äôs to a thriving, sustainable and nourishing future for üá™üá∫EU fisheries.

Happy #WorldFisheriesDay! https://t.co/Oi8dznXBjd

Brewing up cooperation ‚òïÔ∏è

Tomas Kazlauskas, director of the Lithuanian Fisheries Serviceüá±üáπ, seen here receiving a farewell present from Director @susan_steele, concluded a fruitful two-week visit at the agency.

Aƒçi≈´! https://t.co/2qwd0KEGN7

The Swedish #CoastGuard team  has arrived at our headquarters for a two-day visit!
 
Meeting with these 12 inspectors is a great chance to strengthen our relationship and reiterate our support for their work.
 
Tack f√∂r att du kom!
 
#WeAssist https://t.co/dcJYpzR3Q3

The Fisheries Inspection Team from Madeiraüáµüáπ has paid us a visit today.

After being welcomed by our director, @susan_steele_, the Portuguese delegation has spent the day getting a detailed look at the agency‚Äôs work.

Obrigado por terem vindo! https://t.co/4N5rojdVbZ

Today, our ED @susan_steele_ is in the Azores presenting EFCA and its activities at the general assembly of the #OutermostRegions Advisory Council.

This GA is a chance to discuss how to improve compliance & provide more support to the fisheries authorities in these regions. üèùÔ∏è https://t.co/2OaYkG8b5g

The planning phase of next year‚Äôs JDPs is already underway!

This day marks the start of an exciting new chapter and a new voyage for the agency‚Äîthe arrival of our new vessel means that we now have double the seagoing assets.

#EUAgencies https://t.co/8Ih1VDCYPZ

We promote the highest common standards for control under the #CFP, assisting Commissioner @VSinkevicius with his mandate of contributing to the European Green Deal. Indeed, EFCA is committed to #sustainability üåä in everything it does as an agency.

#WeAssist https://t.co/tUABSwSveK

and Fisheries @VSinkevicius is visiting our
